resources.string: Located in an old shopping center off Fielder Rd, Fork in the Road is a rare gem. Come for the Crackeroni, stay for the incredible sandwiches!
Right off Cooper near UTA and Arlington High School is this gem. Incredible orange chicken and boba at a great price!!
The incredibly atmospheric Istanbul Grill is off South Cooper Street near Sublett. Try the Turkish Coffee!!
An incredible pancake and breakfast house with a great brunch menu. Try the blueberry pancakes!!
The original Six Flags amusement park with low prices to get in and tons of roller coasters to explore!
Come pay one price to play all the classic arcade games of your childhood! Grab a bite to eat or host a party!
Experience the most incredible water slides, lazy river, and incredible surfing waves of the worlds greatest water park!
Come watch Americas football team, host a major event, or get a tour and DFWs largest stadium.
The Arlington Museum of Art is dedicated to champion creativity and to provide access to art for the cultural enrichment and economic development of our community.

Nestled in the heart of beautiful downtown Arlington amid some of the best restaurants in town and just a few blocks from Arlington Museum of Arts is one of the premier live music venues in the DFW Metroplex: Arlington Music Hall.
Arlington Highlands Lifestyle Center. Shop, Dine, Work, Play, Stay - in central DFW Metroplex location. Bring the Family. Tourist Attractions Nearby

Planning a visit to the “Best Big City” in the South? Include a trip to the most exciting lifestyle shopping center in the area - The Parks Mall at Arlington. Indulge in more than 170 specialty stores, and fit a film into your spree at the onsite AMC Theatres. Or, enjoy a kids’ party in the play area that features a carousel and NHL-size ice skating ring.
